physDesc.additional: Xylograph (shing dpar). Numbers 84 and 85 appear on the same folio. Folio numbering in letters in the left margin on the recto (on the verso on f. 1), mostly in dbu can. A few numbers are written in dbu med (e.g., 34 on fol. 34b and 35 on fol. 35a). Arabic numbers in the left margin up to 32 and on fol. 40 and some later folios, in the right margin on other folios (12 on f. 12b, 2* on f. 29b, 32 on f. 34b, 3* on f. 34a, 35 on f. 35b, 4 on 41b, 4 on 43b, 4 on 45b, 4 on 46b, 4 on 47b, 50 on f. 50b, 51 on 51b, 52 on 52a, 5* on f. 53a, 54 on f. 54a, 5* on 55b, 57 on 57b), as well and Tibetan cursive numerals are probably a recent addition. Folio number on last folio: gya bzhi gya lnga gc(ig go) Lines per folio: 7; 3 on f. 84 and 85b. Orthography: - particle pa/ba takes the form ba after final –n - orthographic variants (e.g., the tsom for the tsom) Rare interlinear additions (e.g., fol. 8a7, fol. 12a1, fol. 12b1). Occasional burring (e.g., fol. 20b, fol. 62b) and fading (e.g., fol. 26b).

body.ab: dpal gro lung ba chen pos mdzad pa'i 'grel chen gyi rnam bshad bzhugs s+ho ||

oM swatiḥ
srid pa gsum gyi brgyan du mdzes de'i ||
yid 'r'ong ston kun ldan dbu 'di ||
bkra shis dpal ldan blo zer las 'khrungs ||
chos kyi spyan mnga' rnams kyi gzigs dang ||

lg.l: skye ba kun du bdag gi blo gros ni ||
dpag med yon tan tshogs kyi 'byung gnas kyi ||
legs gsungs 'di' cung zad ngal byas pas ||
'gro kun srid mtsho che las myur sgrol shog || ||

body.ab:
don gyi gnas rnams ni phal cher slob dpon bdag nyid chen pos Probably rNgog Blo ldan shes rab (db:3786) sbyar ba | 'di nyid kyi don bsdus ba dang | 'grel ba rung ba'i bshad sbyar gyi rjes su 'brangs te rtogs par bya'o || 'dir ni kho bos skyes bu dam pa de'i gsung gi bdud rtsi'i zer ma la gces spras byas te
tshig gi cha ji tsam rnyed pa de brjed byang du bkod pa yin no || 'phags pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa'i don cung zad | dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas kyi brjed byang du bkod pa yin no || ||

swa ti ḥ
rgyal yusyum sbus pa dum kun mchog gyur kyang ||
don rgyas tshig nyung shin tu rtogs bka' ste ||
de don 'grel la dbang du gyur ba yi ||
rgyal sras bzang pos
rgyan gyi snang ba mdzad ||
des kyang mi gang la rjes 'jug gdul bya la ||
rgya bod 'dran zla bral ba'i gro lung bas ||
rgyan gyi snang ba'i rnam bshad phul byung mdzad ||
'di la ma rten 'grel chen phyogs mthong med ||

lg.l: don 'di mthong nas mkha' spyod dbang po ngas ||
bka' brgya phrag mang po dang du blangs ||
dad ldan rngor bsam bza' mi rnams dang ni ||
dpal ldan bkris shisbkra shis mgon gyis sbyin bdag byas ||
